title: FT: Nap Lajoie Batting PSA A. ***TRADED***
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Nap Lajoie Batting PSA A. ***TRADED***
posts.post_content:
Hi, I have this Lajoie Batting available for trade. Looking for a decent EPDG, preferably one I don’t have but will consider upgrades/downgrades that you may have.  Will also consider other trades that will upgrade my 520. Let me know what you have.

Card is decent. Obviously has been trimmed but has a great color. There is a crease across his uniform left to right.

Anyone got something for trade?
